name: list_current_advisories
description: List the details of existing advisories.

name: update_advisory_document
description: Modify the content of an advisory document to ensure it aligns with the latest ethical guidelines and strategies.

advisory_id.description: The ID of the advisory document to be updated.

new_content.description: The revised content for the advisory document.

name: remove_data
description: Remove specified data from a dataset.

dataset_name.description: The name of the dataset from which to remove data.
